long_description: Soft on the top for extra comfort and high durability, the Boardworks B-Ray Stand Up Paddleboard has a stable design that makes it a great choice for beginning paddlers. Board is built for stability whether you're just beginning or have mastered the surf; 10 ft. 6 in. board has a 33 in. width and the 11 ft. 6 in. board has a 33.9 in. width. High volume and high weight capacity make this board an excellent choice for larger paddlers looking to explore flatwater and light surf. Watertight, hand-shaped EPS foam core is laminated with fiberglass epoxy resin and dual wood stringers for responsive stiffness, strength and lasting durability. High density nose and tail feature bumpers to protect board as you learn to paddle. Single center fin promotes straight tracking in the water. Center handle makes transporting the Boardworks B-Ray Stand Up Paddleboard a breeze.
short_description: Soft on the top for extra comfort and high durability, the Boardworks B-Ray Stand Up Paddleboard has a stable design that makes it a great choice for beginning paddlers.
